description: do not work yaru theme on ubuntu 18.04

I've been using MMEX in Windows for my personal finances for years now, and just recently began using it primarily in Ubuntu 19.1... this has always been a fantastic piece of software! My only complaint is that it takes a while to start up under Ubuntu. I'm wondering if the problem may be with the Snap and may try compiling it from source later (I am somewhat noobish at doing such things, however). Anyway, I love this software and can't give it a recommendation good enough.

It sends information to the Internet. For me it is unacceptable for this type of program.
Its documentation functions do not work
It creates a second type of home directory as "962".

Using it in Windows with great satisfaction. But despite many attempts could not make it work in Ubuntu 20.04. Not even possible to open it after first warning that there was an update that could be done!
summary: Uninstalled: did not work in my machine - running 20.04

description: Downloaded and installed Ubuntu latest and greatest, could not get MMEX to run.
summary: Grat app on Windows, not on Ubuntu

description: Okay brilliant yes, but like all software it has its hickups along the way
summary: Have used this for years now, just brilliant

description: Constantly resets, display white letters on white background. Not usable at all....
summary: Not working stable on my Ubuntu

description: Using Ubuntu 21.10 - Intro screen links fail to work. Unable to update from 1.3.3 to 1.3.7. The import link does like CSV files. ut other than that issue the program worked once I fix the date format by human error. Simple to use once you learn how to use it. Will be using it still to evaluate the program. But if the bugs aren't fixed in the next few months I will resort back to my previouse program.
Le meilleuur sur linux et Windooz
summary: Mon suivi de comptes depuis des années

description:
Logiciel très complet, paramétrable, je l'ai utilisé pendant longtemps, même si ça n'a pas toujours été simple de l'installer sur Ubuntu. 
Seul problème : je viens d'installer la dernière LTS d'Ubuntu et MMEX n'est plus capable de lire mes données de la version précédente. Ça avait déjà été le cas il y a 2 ans, mais il n'y aura pas de 3ème fois, j'abandonne. Dommage.
summary: Du bon et du moins bon

description: Bonjour, les versions "LTS" d'UBUNTU, ont l'habitude de refuser beaucoup de versions de logiciels, dont MMEX. Pour ma part j'abandonne les versions LTS pour éviter les mêmes refus.
